page.title: 07The School Nurse
page.content: The school nurse's day begins at 8-30 at Hendon Health Centre.The morning is spent making appointments for children's school medicals and testing children's hearing.Afternoon is taken up with school visits - testing eyes,hearing ang general hygiene.Three nurseries and three primary schools are visited throughout the year and every child needs to be seen at least once a term.School nurses have cars because they carry hearing machines and other heavy equipment.Social problems make home visiting necessary and some children have to be watched in case of non-accidental injury.Meetings with Doctor,Senior Nursing Officer and other school nurses are a way of keeping up with what is going on.Before going home at 4-30,plans for the following day are made.
